text: aur vahee hai, jo apanee daya (varsha) se pahale vaayuon ko (varsha) kee shubh soochana dene ke lie bhejata hai aur jab ve bhaaree baadalon ko lie udatee hain, to ham use kisee nirjeev dharatee ko (jeevit) karane ke lie pahuncha dete hain, phir usase jal varsha kar, usake dvaara pratyek prakaar ke phal upaja dete hain. isee prakaar, ham murdon ko jeevit karate hain, taaki tum shiksha grahan kar sako
